title: Module 1: Add circuit breaker and parallel fallback for API calls
description: Module 1 has tech debt: No circuit breaker - if all APIs fail, requests continue trying. Need to implement circuit breaker pattern and make fallback chain parallel instead of sequential for better performance.
design: Add circuit breaker to stop trying APIs after consecutive failures. Parallelize API calls with Promise.all for fallbacks. Add monitoring metrics for API success/failure rates per source.
notes: Module 1: Stock Data API - Complexity 7/10. Issue: 72. No Circuit Breaker, 73. No Monitoring, 74. Hardcoded Priorities

title: Module 5: Add error boundaries and module lifecycle management
description: Module 5 has tech debt: No error boundaries - one module error can crash entire app. No module lifecycle - no cleanup on tab switch. Need to implement proper error handling and lifecycle management to prevent crashes and memory leaks.

title: Configure gitignore and gitattributes for beads collaboration
description: Update .gitignore to remove .beads directory but keep SQLite cache files excluded. Add .gitattributes with merge strategy for beads JSONL files. Enable collaborative issue tracking in git.

title: Module 4: Implement automated data updates and validation for stock universe
description: Module 4 has tech debt: No real-time updates for market cap/symbol changes. Need to implement automated updates, data validation, and validation of delisted stocks. Current manual seeding is not scalable.

title: Module 7: Enhance DCF with Monte Carlo simulation and export features
description: Module 7 has tech debt: No Monte Carlo simulation for uncertainty, limited scenarios (only 3 fixed), no sensitivity charts, no peer comparison, no export/export features. Need to enhance DCF analysis with statistical modeling and user features. Also need ability to save/app review DCF analysis rationale.
